Text:
Arigato :D
this was my request...thanx for doin this in 720p :D
keep up the awesome work :)
Then click on "+"... before the bogeyman and his few "minuses".
I think you are the m0st consistent uploaded on TPB.Dhanks Bro:-)

nice upload i love cronenberg, this will replace my xvid copy till the BR come out...

and its good that the file size is a big bigger..

@X3MEX: It was requested so. Gentleman from first comment have said "720p preferred" - and I encoded 480p first, then we both "agreed" that eXistenZ should be 720p. Well... I encoded a new one. It's HDTV 16/9 and file-size I cannot shrink without compromising the quality of the encode and I tend not to do that. m certain that for many of my "regulars" 800MB is to big to take, and I suggest a Google search for XviD which is just 100 MB smaller - but frame size is "pygmy" compared to my 720p.

damn..superb quality ... i rarely see small size brrips/hdtvrips in quality like this one :)
a/v - 10/10
thanx again :)

very good quality, this is how small size 720p rips should be done..cheers !!

Video
Bit rate: 1 119 Kbps
Maximum bit rate: 12.6 Mbps
Width: 1 216 pixels
Height: 688 pixels
Frame rate: 23.976 fps
Audio
Bit rate mode: Variable
Bit rate: 64.4 Kbps
Maximum bit rate: 99.1 Kbps
Channel(s): 2 channels
video really good compression ! but audio? why AAC2Ch variable only 64-99kHz ? If the rip is HD should have both Audio and Video at good quality ...in my opinion !!!
